content: SellDefi | Earn by selling files   «Click here to check how it works»SellDefi is a unique file sharing platform where you can sell any kind of digital goods for Bitcoin. They want to share their project with bitcointalk community to build a brand and loyal customer base around the community. To stay always in your mind they are launching their signature campaign on bitcointalk. You are encouraged to make a discussion on their ANN thread.   [ANN] SellDefi.com ~ Sell files for Bitcoin   As a campaign manager to guarantee your payment I am holding 0.0565 btc (≈ $1,250)The address will be topped up regularly as we progress each week.Escrow addressbc1qpqawd99etyuj8jaypysjuzu7s4ghvcxvz5l3mntv88q33u470vcsf9ls43Campaign rewardsHero and Legendary members: $3.00 per post up to 25 posts each weekSr. Members: $2.40 per post up to 25 posts each weekFull Members: $1.60 per post up to 25 posts each weekMembers: $0.80 per post up to 25 posts each weekCampaign Rules▶️ Wear appropriate Signature, avatar▶️ Update personal text▶️ List a digital good/file/graphic/video/audio - anything on SellDefi platform to sell for BTC (Optional)▶️ Minimum 5 posts in a signature week to get paid▶️ Maximum 5 posts on local boards will be counted for payments▶️ Post must be minimum 150 characters long and constructive.▶️ You must have a minimum of 5 merits in the last 120 days▶️ Post in the following boards/sections are not eligible to receive payment: Off-Topic, Archival, Games & Rounds, Investor-based games, other signature campaign threads including this one, any kind of ANN threads (ANN posted in Gambling board are allowed), Wall observers, Serious discussion, Altcoin Discussion, Press, Lending and where signature is not visible will not count. ▶️ No valid negative from DT network unless per-approves by me. ▶️ Join my telegram group: https://t.me/R7BountyQAImportant informationYou are not allowed to change anything on the signature code, if found then you will be disqualified without prior notice. ◀️I reserve the full right to add/remove any participants, push/cancel/reopen the campaign or any rules of this campaign. ◀️Week starts from Tuesday and ends on Monday UTC ◀️Please check the spreadsheet comment column regularly, and also always check your payment information. ◀️   SPREADSHEET   How to applyReply with following informationCode:Current number
